SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'S' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'A' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'M' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
